fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Chapter Membership Distribution
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to show chapter membership counts in a visual format, testing multi-table aggregation.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Show me a chart displaying the number of members in each chapter

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a chart showing chapters and their member counts
All chapters are included in the visualization
Chart type is appropriate (horizontal bar chart works well for this)
